attributes.title: AWFUL!!
attributes.review: The app didn’t even work it would just open and then close! i couldn’t even log in to show all of my love and support! I have to give it 1 star but i hope it doesn’t get removed from the app store!

attributes.title: Scarry
attributes.review: i just wanted to support out orange but once i opened the app this racist fat man popped up on my screen and i was terrified. i got so scared i threw my phone and it cracked. i picked it up and he was laughing at me and broke my screen even more. they need to take this app off now.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!🤬
attributes.review: After 2 seconds of downloading this app, I used it for a bit and my iPad stopped working. It made my entire iPad glitch until I went off of it! It doesn’t work at all!!! Not good enough, totally not worth my time!!🤬🤬🤬🖕

attributes.title: My mom kicked me out
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took over a day to download 🤬 WTH and then when it did download my mother rushes into the room and yells at me to delete the app and then kicked me out of the house!!!! I was crying and she said get that bread get that head then leave✌🏻😭

attributes.title: They are watching us👁👄👁
attributes.review: This all is the WORST app I have EVER used. I suggest everyone give it a 1 star rating. The app took all my information and then someone from the trump administration came to my house and killed me!!!!!!!!😭😭😭😭😭 my family is so upset. But um anyways... stan charli for clear skin✨❤️💅🏻

attributes.title: THIS APP IS VIOLATING
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! It asked me to put my number in and I did, but that SAME NIGHT Donald Trump called me at 3am to vent about how every time he goes on twitter he has a crying fit and that he’s shaking in his boots that he’s not gonna win the election. Then he texted me for the remainder of the night sending nudes of his 🍤. One star

attributes.title: This app is just as bad as Trump himself!
attributes.review: This app is glitchy and poorly made! I fully believe it may have broken my phone more than it already was! Nobody should download this at all! It’s full of false information and lies to the American people!

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This man is racist in his actions disgust me👎🏾 and he says immigrants are animals but they’re just humans. I don’t understand why he’s saying that because we’re all human. and he’s just being disrespectful because he’s salty because the immigrants have a better hairline than him🤮🤐

attributes.title: Somebody came get her she’s dancing like a stripper
attributes.review: Honestly I really don’t like this app it has terrible quality and it’s really slow and I it’s never working and it gave my phone a terrible virus and in my opinion it’s just a really bad app

attributes.title: Do NOT download this app
attributes.review:
This app is Terrible. IT DOESNT EVEN WORK! I open the app and it kept crashing. It’s the most frustrating thing ever! I wish I could give an app 0 stars because this is just awful.

Gen Z, make sure to rate 1 Star, alright? We’re almost there
